img_summary: The image depicts a scene from a video game where a character is lying on a snowy terrain amidst a storm of blue lightning. The environment is mountainous with rocky cliffs and snow-covered trees. The character's health and action bars are visible at the bottom of the screen, indicating gameplay elements. The name "Kang Jin Star" appears above the health bar, suggesting the character's identity or a significant game element. Various icons and controls are displayed on the left and right sides of the screen, which likely represent abilities or items available to the player.
